textBeforeTable: Events If you want to help get the BillingsLUG, HelenaLUG, or the MissoulaLUG started again, be sure to visit us in IRC. MissoulaLUG The MissoulaLUG is currently on hiatus but a few individuals are working in the background to change that ASAP. HelenaLUG The HelenaLUG is currently on hiatus. MSU-Bozeman EPS Building, Rm 259 Bozeman, MT Used to be the LAST Thursday, but we changed it. BozemanLUG The BozemanLUG meets on the FIRST Thursday of the month at 7PM BillingsLUG The BillingsLUG hasn't had a meeting in a while but they are hoping to start back up real soon. Really. Meet up with Montana Linux people on IRC. We currently gather at the #ubuntu-montana room on the freenode network. Stop in and say "hello" or even ask/answer some questions. Don't have to be a Ubuntu user either. Or use the web-based chat client. LUG Meetings Request new password Password: *
